pr_title: DEV-1547 Run from bam files and allow overriding of ref genome

timeline.message: DEV-1547 Add optional bam to the sample model
DEV-1547 Add ability to override the reference genome

DEV-1547 Run from bam files specified in JSON and allow overriding of ref genome

Bam support is added via the JSON datamodel, with an optional path. If the path is there, lanes
are ignored and the BwaAligner just returns the location of the bam to subsequent stages.

Overriding the ref genome is done with a new argument (this will be a bit more convenient in
platinum, as including it the JSON will mean a lot of duplication). If the argument is present,
the resource files are decorated and a special command is added to the bash script to download
the genome to the normal resources directory.
DEV-1547 Fix typo in decorator and merge master
